name: LapDav
short_description:
Linux / *nix Virtual file-system solution 
The LapDav project is in early planning stage. Early development is done in a semi-private set-up until the first code starts to get it's shape.

Early code, documentation and other public writings/outings are licensed under a Creative commons NO Commercial licence. This will change to BSD when the first usable code is there. 

Naturally we welcome community developers to come and see what we're up to. Please use the Ticket System if you are interested in contributing.
summary: Planning: New Virtual filesystem approach for Linux and other *nix
